name: A Witch and Her Cat (Demo)
description:
You play as both the Witch, Brígh (Bree) and her cat Hex. Collect grimoire pages to advance your spell knowledge and employ them to overcome the obstacles that stand in the way of enchanting the Elder Stones.

Please note: This is a demo/proof of concept, so it is a very short game.

Linux version runs on SteamDeck.

Known issues: Resolutions smaller than 1920x1080 will have problems displaying the game.  Mouse buttons can not be used as input.
